title: Justin Trudeau answers voters widely shared Facebook letter
text:
Justin Trudeau answers voter's widely shared Facebook letter 
CBC News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Prime minister-designate Justin Trudeau has been busy reaching out to Canadians since his Liberal Party's majority win in Monday's federal election. 
The morning after his victory, Trudeau...
